remarks: The subspaces of a subspace are the smaller subspaces.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.)
statement:
lsslss.x $e |- X = ( W |`s U ) $.
lsslss.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsslss.t $e |- T = ( LSubSp ` X ) $.
lsslss $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> ( V e. T <-> ( V e. S /\ V C_ U ) ) ) $.
